function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The presence of confirmed COVID-19 cases per regional population as a potential confounding variable in the analysis.","Impact":"Potential distortion of the associations between green features and psychological health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Careful consideration of alternative confounders and adjustment for them in the analysis.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and analysis tools for identifying and adjusting for confounding variables.","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and data analysts conducting the analysis.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"The high number of positive COVID-19 cases in certain regions in relation to the total population.","Impact":"Potential influence on the generalizability of the findings to regions with lower COVID-19 cases.","Mitigation":"Conducting sensitivity analyses to assess the robustness of the associations across different regions and considering the impact of COVID-19 cases on the results.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and sensitivity analysis tools for assessing robustness.","People":"Researchers and statisticians involved in the analysis.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"The division of participants into smart workers and non-smart workers based on their current working mode (CWM).","Impact":"Potential influence of CWM on the associations between green features and psychological health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Considering the potential impact of CWM as an effect modifier and appropriately adjusting for it in the analysis.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and interaction analysis tools for assessing effect modification.","People":"Researchers and statisticians conducting the analysis.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."}]}
